attributes.action: Proclaim Cheese on Toast as the Official Wesh National Dish (Welsh Rarebit)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should declare Cheese on Toast the welsh national dish to recognize the unique contribution that the Welsh people, though their language and customs have made to the United Kingdom.  It is very important to our national heritage, and to build bridges between our communities, and promote our shared multicultural heritage.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
